title: 7 Hills of Rome - Mahjong [FINAL] 2015 (PC) Foxy Games
description:
About Game:
************
Welcome to 7 Hills of Rome - Mahjong, an adventurous Mahjong challenge in ancient Rome. Vorenus, a famous centurion, guides you through the most stunning parts of the Empire. Remove all tiles from the playing fields to continue your journey and meet the great warriors of the Roman legions. Test yourself against legendary champions in 7 Hills of Rome - Mahjong today! 

Game Features:
**************
    experience ancient Rome like never before and become a Mahjong champion
    select your choice of tiles for an amazing visual experience
    match free tiles to clear the playing fields of the legendary empire
    click two identical legionnaire tiles and unlock epic power-ups 

Game Info:
***********
Ready 2 Play
Crack: Velocity
RePacked by: Foxy Games
Released: 2015
Size: 58 Mb
Platform: PC / Windows
Genere: Mahjong

Instructions:
**************
1.Download
2.Install
3.Play and Have Fun 
4.Keep Seeding!
